cmp: 致 (fine and close, to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey)

exm.mng: carefree, in the mood for enjoyment
producing abnormality, leading to genetic malformation, teratogenic
to study the underlying principle to acquire knowledge, abbr. for 格物致知[ge2 wu4 zhi4 zhi1], word for Western natural sciences during late Qing
to study the underlying principle to acquire knowledge (idiom); pursuing knowledge to the end
Ma Zhiyuan, Yuan dynasty dramatist in the 雜劇|杂剧 tradition of musical comedy, one of the Four Great Yuan dramatists 元曲四大家
to employ, to recruit (talented personnel), to gather together (a team)
